mapper.select: SELECT tb1.id,tb1.content,tb1.createTime,tb2.name,tb2.icon,COUNT(tb3.id) AS likeCount,#{uid} = tb3.uid AS isLike FROM manga_comment tb1 LEFT JOIN manga_user tb2 ON tb1.uid = tb2.id LEFT JOIN manga_comment_like tb3 ON tb1.id = tb3.commentId AND tb3.isDelete = 0 WHERE tb1.mid = #{mid} AND tb1.isDelete = #{isDelete} GROUP BY tb1.id ORDER BY tb1.createTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE manga_comment SET isDelete = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT isDelete FROM `manga_comment_like` WHERE uid = #{uid} AND commentId = #{commentId}
